text:
This seems to be a quotation mark problem. Check if your
property ss.dir already contains quotes (i.e. is set
to <"c:\program files\..."> instead of <c:\program files\...>).

creator: mplr@oce.nl
text:
I've thought about the quotes and have re-tried. It didn't happen until I 
installed Java 1.4 beta 2 (build 1.4.0-beta-b65). My Ant version is 1.3 (I 
changed the version in the bug info, I had selected the 1.4-2 because of my 
java env).
